titles.title: A bill to designate the post office building being constructed in West Liberty, Texas, as the "M. P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Sr., Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/27/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the post office building in Liberty, Texas, as the M.P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Senior, Post Office Building.
